title: ★★★▌ ▌ ▌UT Bus Route ~ Several Bills Paid ~ Pools
posting_body: Terrific value 1 Bedroom available for summer pre-leasing (both July 29th and Aug. 18th move in date options)!
Free A/C, heat, and gas (cooking & heating of water), and free parking on site as well!
You'll pay for electricity consumed from things you plug into outlets, as well as paying for internet service.
Two beautiful huge 9' deep swimming pools are at this complex, along with two on site laundry centers.
Located on a UT bus route, and you can walk to the HEB grocery store as well as the 24 Hour Fitness gym and In-N-Out Burger, among other great places.
It's also located very close to the Hancock Golf Course and the great ~1 mile trail going around the course which is popular among joggers and dog owners in the neighborhood.
This 1/1 floor plan is available from $1150/month - please contact us for details!
The carpeted unit would be the list price and the wood floor unit would be $1190.
The lease would go until the summer of next year.
There’s also a larger one bed floor plan on the property at a higher price.
Additionally, this property offers barbecue grills and lush mature landscaping, as well as 24 hour emergency maintenance.
Inside each apartment, you'll find ceiling fans in all bedrooms, dishwasher, spacious closets, gas cooking, wiring for cable in all rooms, and updated interiors.
In select apartment units, you may also find pass through bars in the kitchen, a separate dining room, and bay window.
This property also has a 2 bed, 1 bath unit available from $1420/mo, and may also have a 2/1.5 or 2/2 as well - please contact us for details!
There is no double occupancy up-charge if you want to share a bedroom with someone.
*Note: Photos in this ad depict a 2 bed, 1 bath unit, as 1 bedroom photos are not available.
